UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The central kink region of fowlicidin-2, an alpha-helical host defense peptide, is critically involved in bacterial killing and endotoxin neutralization.
Literature.Author: Xiao Y, Herrera AI, Bommineni YR, Soulages JL, Prakash O, Zhang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=200 µM,Human erythrocytes:90% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:45% Hemolysis=10 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=2µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-39(MIC=1-2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=1-2µM)
